articles.description: A new interactive map created by Facebook shines a new light on the spread of the coronavirus: Rather than showing the number of people who have tested positive for COVID-19, it shows how many people have reported symptoms in a US county.
articles.content:

articles.title: Spike in pollution may make people more vulnerable to coronavirus - Livemint
articles.description: The ministries of health and environment are slated to meet next week to discuss ways to contain pollution levels.As per the WHO’s 2018 global air pollution cities database, 14 of the 15 most polluted cities are in India
articles.content:
